name: LMMS
description: LMMS is a cross-platform music production software favored by the majority of music lovers. You can make music by computers, involving songs creating, rhythms, voice synthesizing and mixing, melody arrangement, etc. In addition, LMMS also integrates a lot of prefabricated instrument.

en_US.description: LMMS is a cross-platform music production software favored by the majority of music lovers. You can make music by computers, involving songs creating, rhythms, voice synthesizing and mixing, melody arrangement, etc. In addition, LMMS also integrates a lot of prefabricated instrument.
en_US.name: LMMS

zh_CN.description: LMMS是一款跨平台的音乐制作软件，受到广大音乐制作爱好者的青睐。您可以通过自己的电脑来制作音乐，其中涉及创建歌曲，节奏，合成或混合声音以及编排旋律等，此外，LMMS还集成了许多的预制乐器。
zh_CN.name: LMMS
